attributes.action: publish guidelines on what constitutes radical as opposed to normal Islam
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With current world and UK events, including the violent cartoon protests and the killing of Theo van Gogh in 2004 because of a film he made, the police/government have asked us to be more vigilant in observing and reporting possible radical Islam activities/persons.

However there are no actual guidelines on what constitutes radical Islam.  This is further confused because there is one version of the Koran and two further books of mohammeds life.  There is not a 'moderate' koran and a 'radical' koran (to my knowledge), therefore even reading the koran as a means by which to measure radical/moderate Islam is flawed.

The government should issue a set of guidelines so the public knows how to identify radical (and therefore a possible troublespot which should be reported) from moderate Islam.
